banner_subtitle: Experience ultimate relaxation with professional massage services right at your home.
services_description: We offer professional massage services to help you relax and restore your health.

services_list.name: Full Body Massage
services_list.description: Helps relieve tension, improve circulation, and bring deep relaxation.

services_list.name: Hot Stone Massage
services_list.description: Using hot stones to soothe muscles, reduce pain and boost energy.

services_list.name: Cupping & Gua Sha
services_list.description: The simplest method to clear heat and cold, removing blockages in energy meridians.

price_description: We offer service packages at reasonable prices tailored to your needs.

price_list.name: VIP Massage
price_list.description: * Therapy and deep relaxation combined with hot stone and cupping.

about_description: Massage Tại Nhà Da Nang proudly provides professional and reputable home massage services in Da Nang. With an experienced, well-trained team of therapists, we commit to delivering the best relaxation experience in the comfort and privacy of your own space. Our mission is to help you recharge, reduce stress, and enhance overall wellness after tiring work hours. Let us take care of you!
about_mission: Our mission is to help you recharge, reduce stress, and enhance overall wellness after tiring work hours. Let us take care of you!
testimonials_subtitle: We are proud to receive positive feedback from our customers.

testimonials_list.name: Nguyễn Thị Lan
testimonials_list.feedback: Excellent service! The therapist was professional and friendly. I felt completely relaxed after the massage.

testimonials_list.name: Trần Văn An
testimonials_list.feedback: I am very satisfied with the home massage service. Comfortable setting, attentive and dedicated therapist.

testimonials_list.name: Lê Ánh Nguyệt
testimonials_list.feedback: This was my first time using a home massage service and I was very impressed. Definitely coming back!
